note: Sample data - run the scraper to get real reviews

reviews.tvSnippet: Excellent service from Axxess! The support team was incredibly helpful and resolved my issue within minutes.
reviews.text: Excellent service from Axxess! The support team was incredibly helpful and resolved my issue within minutes. Highly recommend their fibre service.

reviews.tvSnippet: Amazing fibre speeds and the installation was quick and professional.
reviews.text: Amazing fibre speeds and the installation was quick and professional. Best ISP I've used in South Africa.

reviews.tvSnippet: Good service overall. Friendly staff and reliable connection.
reviews.text: Good service overall. Friendly staff and reliable connection. Would recommend to friends and family.

reviews.tvSnippet: The fibre installation was seamless. Technician was professional and explained everything clearly.
reviews.text: The fibre installation was seamless. Technician was professional and explained everything clearly. Very happy with the service.

reviews.tvSnippet: Service is okay. Had some issues initially but they were eventually resolved.
reviews.text: Service is okay. Had some issues initially but they were eventually resolved. Average experience overall.

reviews.tvSnippet: Switched from another provider and couldn't be happier. Support team is always helpful and quick to respond.
reviews.text: Switched from another provider and couldn't be happier. Support team is always helpful and quick to respond. Great value for money.

reviews.tvSnippet: Reliable internet connection with good speeds. Customer service is responsive.
reviews.text: Reliable internet connection with good speeds. Customer service is responsive. Minor billing issue was sorted quickly.

reviews.tvSnippet: Installation was delayed multiple times. Communication could be better.
reviews.text: Installation was delayed multiple times. Communication could be better. Eventually got connected but the process was frustrating.

reviews.tvSnippet: Excellent experience from start to finish. The team is professional and friendly.
reviews.text: Excellent experience from start to finish. The team is professional and friendly. Fibre speeds are exactly as advertised.

reviews.tvSnippet: Been with Axxess for 2 years now. Consistent service and helpful support when needed.
reviews.text: Been with Axxess for 2 years now. Consistent service and helpful support when needed. Would recommend.
